sentences.en: An inability to do that is the price paid for protection from famine by those predisposed to marasmus.
sentences.cn: 由那些预先安排给消瘦症患者免于饥馑措施付出的代价就是，要做到这些相当无能为力。

sentences.en: Marasmus is the condition resulting from caloric inadequacy of the diet.
sentences.cn: 消瘦是由饮食的热量不足引起的症状.

sentences.en: The clinical manifestations of the cancer were bloody spatum, faver, chest pain and marasmus.
sentences.cn: 分析了肺癌的临床表现,主要是血痰 、 发热 、 胸痛与消瘦.

trans.tran_en: general emaciation and wasting, esp of infants, thought to be associated with severe malnutrition or impaired utilization of nutrients
